summary: Implements the Glorot (Xavier) uniform weight initializer, generating tensor values from a uniform distribution bounded by ±sqrt(6/(fan_in+fan_out)). The class optionally accepts a seed or seed generator to make the sampling deterministic across calls.
business_intent: Provides a reliable, mathematically‑grounded initialization strategy for neural‑network layers, helping models converge faster and more stably when used in frameworks such as Keras.
